data.title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi
eligibility_criteria:
6000 per year to all landholding farmer families.
Eligibility: All landholding farmer families with cultivable land.
Income Limit: Family income below Rs 2,00,000 per annum (excluding institutional landholders).
Benefits: Rs 2000 every 4 months directly to bank account.
Documents: Aadhaar, Land records, Bank account.
States: All India.
Category: Agriculture, Direct Benefit Transfer.

PM-KISAN provides income support of Rs 6000 per year to all landholding farmer families.
Eligibility: All landholding farmer families with cultivable land.
Income Limit: Family income below Rs 2,00,000 per annum (excluding institutional landholders).
Benefits: Rs 2000 every 4 months directly to bank account.
Documents: Aadhaar, Land records, Bank account.
States: All India.
Category: Agriculture, Direct Benefit Transfer.
